name: MagicChugs
description:
Here it is As Promised the game comes out for Halloween 
I hope you like it I spent a lot of time there and I also tried 
to gather a lot of ideas from you almost all of what you will 
see playing it was made by me also explains why it's
not perfect:
-Music By Royalty Free zone (no copyright)
-The Texture of the bush are from Shrek the original XboX game
-There are a few Easter eggs and a lot of reference
-The life gauge is for example Badlanchugs' boot-shaped 
glass and some audio clips are from his videos
-As for the enemies, it was planned to put zombies but 
there were a lot of bugs due to the animation, 
so they were imagined by my girlfriend
